channel.title: Don't Allow Chilled People to Vote

item.title: Don't Allow Chilled People to Vote
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
Also, minor sort-of related to necro’d thread suggestion, prevent chilled people from emoting.

“3, are you reaped?”
3 laughs maniacally
“Nope, he must be chilled.”

Read full topic
item.source: Don't Allow Chilled People to Vote

item.title: Don't Allow Chilled People to Vote
item.dc:creator: squidgyxombie
item.description:
I see the thread was necro’d… but I’ve had enough Reaper games where it’s getting low and I chill someone who already voted… making it worthless. Especially annoying when it’s King, and they point the finger after being chilled.

Can chill force them to rescind the vote?

Read full topic
item.source: Don't Allow Chilled People to Vote

item.title: Don't Allow Chilled People to Vote
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
Just increase the time between votes that a chilled player has to wait before they can change their vote, maybe up to 30 seconds between votes. They will still be able to vote when it matters, but will be unable to signal other players with it.

Read full topic

item.source: Don't Allow Chilled People to Vote

item.title: Don't Allow Chilled People to Vote
item.dc:creator: bbiaglla
item.description:
they won’t instant win and they can still allow the chilled to vote but just not spam vote, make it like 1 every 10 seconds or 1 per trial. At 6 people alive that leaves the reaper and 3 others right? the reaped target, chilled target, reaper, and 3 others. That isn’t an instant win at all. That leaves 3 people who can still figure out who the reaper is. By then they know its a reaper game anyways and seeing who is reaped/chilled isn’t too hard at that point.

Read full topic
item.source: Don't Allow Chilled People to Vote
